leaveTrackModal.leaveResetTrackForm.stro:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading for a list of consequences of leaving and resetting a track
**UI Location**: Leave and Reset Track modal
**When Users See This**: When the user opens the Leave and Reset Track modal
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "By leaving and resetting this track, you will:"
leaveTrackModal.leaveResetTrackForm.list:
**Functional Purpose**: Consequence of leaving and resetting a track: loss of submitted solutions
**UI Location**: Leave and Reset Track modal (list item)
**When Users See This**: When the user opens the Leave and Reset Track modal
**Technical Context**: Variable `trackTitle` must remain unchanged.
**Current English**: "Lose access to all solutions you have submitted in %{trackTitle}"

**Functional Purpose**: Consequence of leaving and resetting a track: loss of mentoring
**UI Location**: Leave and Reset Track modal (list item)
**When Users See This**: When the user opens the Leave and Reset Track modal
**Technical Context**: Variable `trackTitle` must remain unchanged.
**Current English**: "Lose access to all mentoring you have received in %{trackTitle}"

**Functional Purpose**: Consequence of leaving and resetting a track: loss of reputation
**UI Location**: Leave and Reset Track modal (list item)
**When Users See This**: When the user opens the Leave and Reset Track modal
**Technical Context**: Variable `trackTitle` must remain unchanged.
**Current English**: "Lose any reputation you have earned for publishing solutions in %{trackTitle}"

**Functional Purpose**: Consequence of leaving and resetting a track: removal from active tracks list
**UI Location**: Leave and Reset Track modal (list item)
**When Users See This**: When the user opens the Leave and Reset Track modal
**Technical Context**: Variable `trackTitle` must remain unchanged.
**Current English**: "Remove %{trackTitle} from your active tracks list"
leaveTrackModal.leaveResetTrackForm.irre:
**Functional Purpose**: Warning message about the irreversible nature of the action
**UI Location**: Leave and Reset Track modal
**When Users See This**: When the user opens the Leave and Reset Track modal
**Technical Context**: Standard text; contains emphasis tag
**Current English**: "This is irreversible and will mean you’ll lose everything you’ve done on this track."
leaveTrackModal.leaveResetTrackForm.conf:
**Functional Purpose**: Label for the confirmation input field
**UI Location**: Leave and Reset Track modal
**When Users See This**: When the user needs to confirm the action by typing a specific phrase
**Technical Context**: Variable `confirmation` must remain unchanged.
**Current English**: "To confirm, write %{confirmation} in the box below:"
leaveTrackModal.leaveResetTrackForm.canc:
**Functional Purpose**: Button to cancel the leave and reset track action
**UI Location**: Leave and Reset Track modal (button)
**When Users See This**: When the user wants to abort the process of leaving and resetting a track
**Technical Context**: Standard text
**Current English**: "Cancel"
leaveTrackModal.leaveResetTrackForm.leav:
**Functional Purpose**: Button to submit the leave and reset track action
**UI Location**: Leave and Reset Track modal (button)
**When Users See This**: When the user has confirmed and wishes to proceed with leaving and resetting the track
**Technical Context**: Standard text
**Current English**: "Leave + Reset"
